Instruction:
Task Description: Create a WebSocket server implementation using org.java_websocket library to handle client connections, messages, disconnections, and errors.

Class Description: MyWebSocketServer is a custom WebSocket server implementation that extends the WebSocketServer class from org.java_websocket. It provides lifecycle methods for managing client connections and communication.

Attributes:
- inherited from WebSocketServer: Various internal attributes for managing server state and connections

Methods:
- Constructor: MyWebSocketServer(InetSocketAddress inetSocketAddress) -> void - Initializes the server with specified socket address
- onOpen: onOpen(WebSocket conn, ClientHandshake handshake) -> void - Called when a new client connects
- onClose: onClose(WebSocket conn, int code, String reason, boolean remote) -> void - Called when a client disconnects
- onMessage: onMessage(WebSocket conn, String message) -> void - Called when a message is received from a client
- onError: onError(WebSocket conn, Exception ex) -> void - Called when an error occurs
- onStart: onStart() -> void - Called when the server starts successfully
